Unfortunately I can't use the swimming pool because it's still under maintenance. Shout out to the front desk team, especially Ms. Nunik and Mr. Wahyu. They're super kind and so helpful. Everything is so good, but one thing, i don't know why, maybe this is still new hotel and the bed is still too firm.

text:
Very please to experience staying at this chic & cozy newest Swiss Belexpress Cilegon, Modern Scandinavian design with Ikea Furniture. Perfect for Business or Leisure travellers. Very easy access from Jakarta only 90 min from Kebun Jeruk Tol gate, located in the heart of Cilegon City.  It has specious parking space. All staff are professional and safety protocol is in place. very good for a 3 star hotel.

I love my two bedroom with sofa and big LCD, Clean and minimalist design very comfortable with big bathroom.
Breakfast is at the lobby with option indoor and outdoor, very yummy. 
The best part I can enjoy pool and gym after meeting, 
Certainly I will come back for my next trip. Highly recommended for family too,
title: Chic & Cozy Modern Hotel in Cilegon
